extension.searchTitle: COMPREHENSIVE ADDICTION AND RECOVERY ACT OF 2015; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 39

congVote.result: The bill (S. 524), as amended, was passed, as follows:
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: By 94 yeas to 1 nay (Vote No. 34), Senate passed S. 524, to authorize the Attorney General to award grants to address the national epidemics of prescription opioid abuse and heroin use.

MOTION TO DISCHARGE--S.J. RES. 31; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 39

congVote.dailyDigestSummary: By 71 yeas to 24 nays (Vote No. 35), Senate tabled the motion to discharge the Foreign Relations Committee from further consideration of S.J. Res. 31, relating to the disapproval of the proposed foreign military sale to the Government of Pakistan of F-16 Block 52 aircraft.
